sentences.sContent: There were only a handful of people there.
...A handful of people can recall almost every day of their lives in enormous detail—and after years of research...
...others only a handful of times in their lives...

phrases.pCn: 少数的人；少量的几个人

trans.tranCn: 一把， 少数， 一小撮
trans.tranOther: an amount that you can hold in your hand
